casebody.data:
Michael KONOVER et al.
v.
Michael KOLAKOWSKI et al. Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided February 6, 2019

The plaintiffs' petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 186 Conn.App. 706, 200 A.3d 1177, is denied.

McDONALD and ECKER, Js., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
